message:
The field data circuit breaker has tripped: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/circuit-breaker.html

Circuit breakers are designed to deal with situations when request processing needs more memory than available. A fielddata circuit breaker is triggered if a query tries to load fielddata that would require over 60 percent of the heap.

What caused this error? Was this a one-time query, or one that we run frequently?

We might need to increase the size of our ES cluster.

@slack-incidents-emp-integ-analytics,@slack-incidents-te-analytics-int
name: [Marketplace Interactions] Elasticsearch Memory: Fielddata Circuit Breaker
